name: Arijit Singh
bio: Renowned playback singer known for his soulful voice in Bollywood. Winner of multiple Filmfare Awards with hits like 'Tum Hi Ho' and 'Channa Mereya'.

name: Shreya Ghoshal
bio: Legendary playback singer with over 1000 songs in multiple Indian languages. National Film Award winner known for her melodious voice.

name: Neha Kakkar
bio: Popular Bollywood playback singer and television personality. Known for hit songs like 'Kala Chashma' and 'Dilbar'.

name: Armaan Malik
bio: Young and talented playback singer known for romantic ballads. Popular for songs like 'Bol Do Na Zara' and 'Main Hoon Hero Tera'.

name: Sunidhi Chauhan
bio: Versatile playback singer with a powerful voice. Known for energetic songs and has won multiple awards including Filmfare Awards.

name: DJ Chetas
bio: India's leading DJ and music producer. Known for Bollywood remixes and has performed at major festivals across India.

name: Nucleya
bio: Pioneer of Indian electronic music scene. Known for bass-heavy tracks and fusion of Indian classical with electronic music.

name: Lost Stories
bio: Electronic music duo known for progressive house and trance music. Regular performers at major Indian music festivals.

name: DJ Shaan
bio: Popular DJ known for Bollywood and commercial music. Regular at clubs and wedding celebrations across India.

name: Zaeden
bio: Young electronic music producer and DJ. Known for melodic dubstep and future bass tracks with millions of streams.

name: Prabhu Deva
bio: Legendary choreographer and dancer known as the 'Michael Jackson of India'. Director and actor with decades of experience.

name: Shakti Mohan
bio: Contemporary dancer and choreographer. Winner of Dance India Dance and judge on various dance reality shows.

name: Dharmesh Yelande
bio: Hip-hop dancer and choreographer. Known for his unique style and performances on Dance India Dance.

name: Bir Radha Sherpa
bio: Versatile dancer known for various dance forms including contemporary, hip-hop, and Bollywood choreography.

name: Raghav Juyal
bio: Dancer, choreographer, and television host known for his slow-motion dance style. Popular as 'King of Slow Motion'.

name: Sadhguru
bio: Renowned spiritual leader, author, and founder of Isha Foundation. International speaker on spirituality and well-being.

name: Gaur Gopal Das
bio: Motivational speaker and lifestyle coach. Former engineer turned monk, known for practical wisdom and life lessons.

name: Dr. Vivek Bindra
bio: Business coach and motivational speaker. CEO coach and author known for leadership and entrepreneurship training.

name: Sandeep Maheshwari
bio: Entrepreneur and motivational speaker. Founder of ImagesBazaar and known for free motivational sessions.

name: Priya Kumar
bio: International motivational speaker and author. Known for leadership training and personal development programs.
